PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT LOANS REGULATIONS by extending, from 18 months to 30 months, the special interest-free period during which students may defer their loan repayments.

precis:
Regulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT LOANS REGULATIONS by extending,
from 18 months to 30 months, the special interest-free period during
which students may defer their loan repayments.
